job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of automated processes, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks of building and integrating functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zet slimme workflows op in tools als Make.com, Bubble en Webflow
job_tasks.justification: Setting up workflows in no-code tools is a form of building applications and integrating functionalities, aligning with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: waarbij je generatieve AI-modellen (OpenAI, Claude, etc.) inzet
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the use ('inzet') of generative AI models, which is the core activity described in this category, even if specific techniques like prompt engineering or RAG are not detailed.
Building and optimizing web applications are core software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je creëert en onderhoudt schaalbare webapplicaties met no-code tools
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the software development aspect, specifically mentioning the creation and maintenance of applications using no-code tools.
This directly refers to the task of designing integrations between different systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Je koppelt verschillende systemen (o.a. Airtable, CRM, Marketingtools) naadloos aan elkaar
job_tasks.justification: This describes the practical implementation of system integrations, a key part of software development and integration.
Advising clients and colleagues on approaches relates to understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: combineert AI- en automation-oplossingen om tot écht innovatieve toepassingen te komen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the strategic application of AI and automation to solve business problems and create innovative solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Je duikt graag de techniek in om bottlenecks te achterhalen en creatieve workarounds te bedenken

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes software development and integration tasks using no-code tools (Macro-Category A), such as building workflows, web apps, and integrations. It also includes a specific task involving the application of generative AI models (Macro-Category B). The balance leans towards software engineering with AI integration, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software that uses AI as a core component.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear and specific about the tasks, tools, and the use of generative AI within a no-code development context. The profile assignment is well-supported by the detailed responsibilities listed.
